official_title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to authorize payment to chiropractors for diagnosis by X-ray of vertebral subluxation.

summary.text: Amends Title XVII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to authorize payment to chiropractors for diagnosis by X-ray of vertebral subluxation.
